TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Huang_Siaw_Mi, title = Huang_Siaw_Mi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huang_Siaw_Mi} }

S.FORM: Huang Siaw Mi u nani' misapud i Bata'an (u kamu nu Hulam:馬太鞍撿來的貓) kakaliman salaedan :動物界 Animalia (aadupen nu salaedan) kulus :脊索動物門 Chordata (kulus nu aadupen) udip :哺乳綱 Mammalia (micucuay a udip) mata :食肉目 Carnivora samataan :貓科 Felidae (samataan nu nani') mikeliday :貓屬 Felis (pazazan muladay tu nani') malecaday :貓 F. catus (malecaday tu nani') misitekeday a wayway sanglacay ku kuku' 白色的腳 manamuh tu misamapulin 喜歡假裝跌倒

Hoang Siaw Mi o nani' misapod i Bata'an (o kamo no Holam:馬太鞍撿來的貓) kakaliman salaedan :動物界 Animalia (aadopen no salaedan) kolos :脊索動物門 Chordata (kolos no aadopen) odip :哺乳綱 Mammalia (micocoay a odip) mata :食肉目 Carnivora samataan :貓科 Felidae (samataan no nani') mikeliday :貓屬 Felis (pazazan moladay to nani') malecaday :貓 F. catos (malecaday to nani') misitekeday a wayway sanglacay ko koko' 白色的腳 manamoh to misamapolin 喜歡假裝跌倒
